About Me

Caleb Crawley

HELLO, WORLD!


I am Caleb Crawley, a 2019 UNCG graduate.
Professionally, I enjoy working with people to come up with solutions to business problems, then use my skills to create and implement those solutions. I do this through software development, design, and strategic planning.
Personally, I enjoy paintball, video games, good food, and good conversation.

What I do

I am most efficient doing web development. I can code the front end of a website, then switch to the backend and make it work with a database to dynamically create, read, update and delete information on the fly. I don’t just stop there, with my people and problem solving skills, if you come to me with an issue, I am able to work with you through it and find a solution that can be implemented in an efficient and cost effective manner.

My specialized skills include coding corporate, eCommerce, and social media web apps. I also enjoy building admin and/or management systems. So, if you need an inventory, employee, or some other type of management system, let’s get it done!

If you are familiar with programming, here are the languages I am advanced in:
PHP, SQL, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX, JSON, HTML and CSS
I also have experience working with RESTful API’s such as Stripe, Paypal, Google and Twitter.
